# Theft Ward
## Overview
Abjuration

**Level:** Cleric 1, Inquisitor 1, Sorcerer 1, Witch 1, Wizard 1

**BoXM:** Cleric 1, Wizard 1

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One object

**Duration:** 1 day

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 167

You ward a single object in your possession against theft. You gain a +10 bonus on Perception checks to notice someone trying to take the object from you.
